content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to dive into these books and explore the world of mixed media and pottery. "The Mixed Media Artist" and "Pottery for Beginners" are both excellent choices to start with, as they'll provide a solid foundation in each area.

Remember, the key to mastering any new skill is to practice consistently, experiment with different techniques, and have fun with the process. Don't be afraid to try new things, make mistakes, and learn from them.

As you work through these books, I encourage you to share your progress, ask questions, and seek feedback from others in online communities or local art groups. This will help you stay motivated, learn from others, and gain new insights.

Most importantly, enjoy the journey and have fun! Mixed media and pottery are both incredibly rewarding mediums that can bring a sense of joy and fulfillment to your life. I'm confident that you'll find inspiration and creativity in these books, and I'm excited to hear about your progress.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy creating, and I look forward to hearing about your artistic adventures!
